Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Fulton
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Washington, Sacramento; SB Sacramento, Warren, California, due to street blockage near California/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near California/Fulton, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Sacramento, Warren, and California.

Allow extra travel time.
